ComicInfo.Title: Northampton Part 3
ComicInfo.Summary:
While strategically secluded in Northampton, the Turtles are hit by new revelations involving enemies' shifting loyalties, miracle cures, and ghosts from the past. And in the present, grave danger is about to strike! What new Foot Clan menace is hunting the Turtles?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Ross Campbell | 1 | B | Cover B | Kevin Eastman | 2 | RI | Retailer Incentive Cover | J. K. Woodward | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 11:40:41. [CVDB446513]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: J. K. Woodward, Kevin Eastman, Sophie Campbell
ComicInfo.Characters: Alopex, April O'Neil, Casey Jones, Donatello, Jennika, Koya, Leonardo, Master Splinter, Michelangelo, Raphael, Shredder
ComicInfo.Teams: Foot Clan, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
